ygData.subject: various
ygData.msgSnippet: Been out of town for a week...just before I left I discovered a fine method of raising Iksar faction, run into the Sarnak fort in the Lake of Ill Omen playing
ygData.messageBody:
Been out of town for a week...just before I left I discovered a fine method
of raising Iksar faction, run into the Sarnak fort in the Lake of Ill Omen
playing Screech, then book it out of town and hunt elsewhere in the zone for
the rest of the night, you will ring up faction hits like clockwork *grin*
Eventually the Iksar guards will be tolerant of me, but I understand that
everyone else in the city will still hate me, well, it's a start.

All the exp issues I had before seemed to have disappeared in Kunark, I am
leveling at breakneck speed, 29 and counting, in fact I am going to wait to
go buy songs until I hit 30, I just don't want to take the time off. I am
not ususally a powerleveler at all, but everyone in the guild is tapping
their foot waiting for me to get the mana song, so, for now, it's:

Log_In();
while(m_iLevel <32 && m_bAwake)
m_iLevel += ppWackStuff(&m_lPlat);
Log_Out();

Tszaaz
